rules.name: Not_Selected_Lot_No_in_pick_process
rules.label: Not Selected Lot No in pick process

rules.name: Invalid_action
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8)) AND ((9 AND 10) OR (11 AND 12) OR (13 AND 14) OR (15 AND 16))
rules.label: Invalid action

rules.name: Allocate_Must_Be_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: Allocate Must Be Selected

rules.name: Pick_Must_Be_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND ( 4 OR 5 ) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Pick Must Be Selected

rules.name: Create_Invoice_Invalid
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (6 AND (4 OR 5)) OR (7 AND 5))
rules.label: Create Invoice Invalid

rules.name: Reverse_Ship_Must_Be_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ( (3 AND 4 AND 7) OR (6 AND 5) OR (8 AND 9 AND 10))
rules.label: Reverse Ship Must Be Selected

rules.name: Reverse_Pack_Must_Be_Selected
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6 AND 7))
rules.label: Reverse Pack Must Be Selected

rules.name: Invalid_Issue_Quantity
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5)) AND 6) OR ((3 AND 7) OR (5 AND 8))
rules.label: Invalid Issue Quantity

rules.name: Qty_issue_is_not_equal_to_Qty_Required
rules.label: Qty issue is not equal to Qty Required

formulas.name: Allocate_Txn_Type
formulas.expression: IF({!Allocate}==TRUE, 'Allocate Sales Order Line', 'Deallocate Sales Order Line')

formulas.name: Allocate_Txn_Type_Consolidated
formulas.expression: IF({!Ship}==TRUE, 'Allocate Sales Order Line', 'Deallocate Sales Order Line')

formulas.name: Issue_Txn_Type
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!SOLINE.rstk__soline_prodtype__c})=='Kit', 'Sales Order Kit Component Pick (Issue)', 'Sales Order Pick(Issue)')

formulas.name: Lable_for_LotNo
formulas.expression: IF({!Package}==True , 'Please select a lot number to do pack:', 'Please select a lot number to do reverse pack:')

formulas.name: Lable_for_shipperline
formulas.expression: IF({!Ship}==True, 'Please select a Shipper Line to do ship:', 'Please select a Shipper Line to do reverse ship:')

formulas.name: Over_all_Sucess_Message
formulas.expression: IF({!Allocate_sydata_Boolean} && {!Allocate} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ALLOCATE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'),'Allocation', IF({!Allocate_sydata_Boolean} && {!Reverse_Allocate} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ALLOCATE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'), 'Reverse Allocation', '')) + IF({!Allocate_sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ALLOCATE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete') && {!Issue_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ISSUE_OR_REVERSE_ISSUE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete') , ', ', '') + IF({!Issue_Sydata_Boolean} && {!Pick} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ISSUE_OR_REVERSE_ISSUE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'),'Pick', IF({!Issue_Sydata_Boolean} && {!Reverse_Issue} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ISSUE_OR_REVERSE_ISSUE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'), 'Reverse Issue', '')) + IF({!Issue_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_ISSUE_OR_REVERSE_ISSUE.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete') && (({!Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_PACK.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete')) || ({!Kit_Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!Get_Sydata_Kit_Product_Pack.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete')) ), ', ', '') + IF((({!Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_PACK.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete')) || ({!Kit_Pack_Sydata_Boolean}&& ISPICKVAL({!Get_Sydata_Kit_Product_Pack.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'))) && {!Package} == True, 'Package', IF({!Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && {!Reverse_Package} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_PACK.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'), 'Reverse Package', '')) + IF((({!Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_PACK.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete')) || ({!Kit_Pack_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!Get_Sydata_Kit_Product_Pack.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete')) )&& {!Ship_Sydata_Boolean} && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_SHIP.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'), ', ', '') + IF({!Ship_Sydata_Boolean} && {!Ship} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_SHIP.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'),'Ship ', IF({!Ship_Sydata_Boolean} && {!Reverse_Ship} == True && ISPICKVAL({!GET_SYDATA_SHIP.rstk__sydata_process__c}, 'ProcessingComplete'), 'Reverse Ship', '')) + ' has been completed successfully.'

formulas.name: Pack_Txn_Type
formulas.expression: IF({!Package}==TRUE || ({!SOCNTL.rstk__socntl_bypasspackage__c}==TRUE && {!Ship}==TRUE ), 'Sales Order Pack', 'Sales Order Pack Reversal')

formulas.name: Service_Mic_Pick_Txn_Type
formulas.expression: IF({!Pick}==TRUE || ({!SOCNTL.rstk__socntl_bypasspackage__c}==TRUE && {!Ship}==TRUE ),'Sales Order Pick(Issue)', 'Sales Order Pick(Issue) Reversal')

formulas.name: Ship_Txn_Type
formulas.expression: IF({!Ship}==TRUE, 'Sales Order Shipment', 'Sales Order Shipment Reversal')
